extendedInfo.description: This theme shows cute and red heart on pink background. Conversation list have also great green text font. You will have no problems with finding any sms on this list. In compose message window you have additionally frames in pink color with some transparency. You can always watch your sweet background when you are reading text messages.  Theme was created especially for Valentine's Day. If you like to celebrate this day also with your phone download this theme for free.Requirements:This theme requires GO SMS Pro application installed on your phone. You can download it for free from Google Play typing GO SMS Pro in search field.This theme contains:-  wallpaper is depicting beautiful, big heart taking the shape of a tree, with small hearts as fruits- changed messages frames, in different pink tones, easier to read with small hearts in the corners and green letters.- pop up window with the same charming, cute apple-tree heartHow to run our theme:1. Download our GO SMS Pro Valentine Heart for free2. Open GO SMS Pro application and press MENU button.3. Choose our Valentine Heart Theme and click applyHow to change theme appearance:1. Open GO SMS Pro application and press Menu button.2. Choose Settings.3. From settings tab select Advanced tab.4. Press Appearance Settings5. Set any option of our theme. You can set there:- Conversation List appearance- Conversation appearance- Popup window appearance- Text Font- Reset to default settings.Support - âTHEMES ARCHITECTâ:If you need help with our theme please contact with us on email: themesarchitect@gmail.comOur support works only in the English language. Please contact us in this language because we will solve your problem easier.Comments and rating:If you want to help other users find our theme please leave comment and positive rating.Before posting negative opinion please contact us. We can solve your issue in most cases and you will be happy using our theme without problems.Advertising:This free application is ads supported. Ads may show in notification tray and / or your smartphone home screen. Permissions are for ads.Other themes from âTHEMES ARCHITECTâFull list of our themes is available by clicking our developer name on Google Play.Check our other GO Launcher EX, GO SMS Pro and GO Locker free themes. Themes are released regularly so you can find something new every time.Compatibility:Our themes has been tested on the most common smartphone-s offered by manufacturers such as: Samsung, HTC, LG, Sony and Motorola. Our themes works with Android 2.2 and later.
